```{r library}
library(tidyverse)

source("./R/almond_model.R")
```


```{r import}
clim_data <- read_delim(file = "./clim.txt ", delim=" ")
```


```{r calculation}
yeild_outcomes <- almond_model(clim_data)
yeild_outcomes
mode(yeild_outcomes)
```
